title: $500 OFF 2-Bedrooms With July Move In-Alief
posting_body: ['For leasing info call or text', 'show contact info', 'today!', 'Ask about ID#811494', 'At the edge of Richmond, Texas, The community is a quiet escape with modern amenities and sleek style.', 'The gated community provides an outdoor oasis with a resort-style pool, yard games, BBQ grills, and a lounge area with a fireplace.', 'Luxury apartments feature sophisticated elements like European-style wood cabinetry, quartz countertops, and wood floors throughout.', 'An outside dog wash and run and fitness center offer convenience while the business and conference center make working from home a breeze.', 'Surrounded by great shopping and dining, These apartments put you at the center of it all.', 'And with easy access to WestPark Toll Road, Highway 6 and The Grand Parkway nearby, accessing Downtown Houston is easier than ever.', 'Community Amenities', 'Resort Style Pool with In-Pool Seating, Waterfall and Fountains', 'Business Center', 'Conference Center', 'Outdoor Ping Pong Tables & Cornhole Lawn', 'Dog Wash and Dog Run', 'Gas BBQ Grill Stations', 'Gazebo with Fireplace and Resident Lounge Seating', 'Bike Repair Center', 'Private Garages Available', 'Fitness Center with Cardio', 'Flex Fitness Room with Yoga, Spin Cycles and the Mirror Virtual Fitness', 'Electric Vehicle Charging Stations', 'Controlled Access Gates w/Remote Entry']
